import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Select from 'react-select'; import './ClientManagement.css'; // Import your CSS file import { states, cities } from './stateCityData'; // Assuming these are the correct exports const nationalities = [ { value: '', label: 'Select Nationality' }, { value: 'American', label: 'American' }, { value: 'Canadian', label: 'Canadian' }, { value: 'British', label: 'British' }, { value: 'Australian', label: 'Australian' }, { value: 'Indian', label: 'Indian' }, // Add more nationalities as needed ]; const ClientManagement = () => { const [clientForm, setClientForm] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', middleName: '', dateOfBirth: '', gender: '', nationality: '', address: '', city: '', stateOrProvince: '', postalCode: '', email: '', phoneNumber: '', passportNumber: '', passportExpirationDate: '', hasDiabetes: false, hasLowBloodPressure: false, hasHighBloodPressure: false, hasEpilepsy: false, hasHeartDisease: false, hasBreathingDifficulty: false, hasHadSurgery: false, surgeryDetails: '' }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(''); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setClientForm({ ...clientForm, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value }); }; const handleSelectChange = (selectedOption, name) => { setClientForm({ ...clientForm, [name]: selectedOption ? selectedOption.value : '' }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/clients', clientForm); setSuccess('Client added successfully!'); setClientForm({ firstName: '', lastName: '', middleName: '', dateOfBirth: '', gender: '', nationality: '', address: '', city: '', stateOrProvince: '', postalCode: '', email: '', phoneNumber: '', passportNumber: '', passportExpirationDate: '', hasDiabetes: false, hasLowBloodPressure: false, hasHighBloodPressure: false, hasEpilepsy: false, hasHeartDisease: false, hasBreathingDifficulty: false, hasHadSurgery: false, surgeryDetails: '' }); setError(''); } catch (error) { setError('Error saving client'); setSuccess(''); } }; return (
